resource.name: Permit Inspections - Master Dataset
resource.description: All Permit Inspections performed by the City of College Station since 2010.

resource.name: Open Budget Revenue - Master Dataset
resource.description: This site provides a guided view through our budget and provides a transparent look at how we allocate public funds. Datasets will update every Friday by 11 p.m. (CST).

resource.name: City of College Station - Business Type Debt Obligations
Traffic Travel Times
resource.description: This data is updated every 5 minutes showing current travel times at major intersections around College Station, TX.

resource.name: Open Budget Revenue - Current Year Totals
resource.description: This dataset provides our current fiscal year's revenue budget and a transparent look at how we allocate public funds. There is also a total at the bottom of the dataset. Datasets will update every Friday by 11 p.m. (CST).

resource.name: Open Budget Expenditures - Current Year Totals
resource.description: This dataset provides our current fiscal year's expenditure budget and a transparent look at how we allocate public funds. There is also a total at the bottom of the dataset. Datasets will update every Friday by 11 p.m. (CST).

resource.name: Permits - Master Dataset
resource.description: All issued permits by the City of College Station since 1989.

resource.name: Open Budget Expenditures - Master Dataset
resource.description: This site provides a guided view through our budget and provides a transparent look at how we allocate public funds. Datasets will update every Friday by 11 p.m. (CST).

resource.name: City of College Station Outstanding Debt Obligations (Tax backed and Business Debt)
Vendors - Master Dataset
resource.description: Vendors tied to the Open Checkbook Master Dataset who have been paid by the City of College Station.

resource.name: City of College Station - Tax Backed Debt Obligations
Open Checkbook - Master Dataset
resource.description: Browse payment information by department, vendor or expenditure type. Datasets will update every Friday by 11 p.m. (CST).
